QuestData.Title: Fisherman's Tonic
QuestData.Description: If you detest these serpents as much as we do, I ask that you continue the fight against them.$B$BThat will mean fighting them in their watery domain. I don't see any gills on you, so we're going to have to concoct an old tonic used by vrykul fishermen.$B$BThe ingredients are plentiful around here, taken that you do not mind picking through entrails.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 4 Axetail Eyes from Axetail Basilisks, a Sashj'tar Air Bladder from Sashj'tar Naga, and a Sample of Siren Blood from Siren Naz'jul in Azuregale Cove.
QuestData.CompletionText: I will help you collect what we need.
QuestData.RewardText: <Brandolf mixes the concoction together.>$B$BWell, I never said that it would taste good. Bottom's up.
